set.name: PTN
set.longname: Port Noon: Occult Islands of Vespera

card.name: Abiogenesis
card.text: Liberate target artifact or enchantment. (Exile it if it isn't a Dragon. If it's exiled, its controller creates a colorless 3/2 Dragon creature token with its abilities.) {R/G}, Embrace Abiogenesis from your hand: Draw a card. (Exile it. You may play it on a later turn that a Wizard or Artificer you control dealt damage to an opponent.)

card.name: Absorb Umwelt
card.text: Target creature gains deathtouch and lifelink until end of turn. Surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)

card.name: Access Tunnel
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {3}, {T}: Target creature you control with power 3 or less can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Accommodation
card.text: As Accommodation enters, choose a creature type. When Accommodation enters and at the beginning of your upkeep, create a colorless Equipment artifact token named House with “equipped creature gets +1/+1” and “equip creature with the chosen type {1}.”

card.name: Aetherbeast Scholar
card.text: Prowess Whenever Aetherbeast Scholar deals combat damage to a player, each player may shuffle their hand and graveyard into their library, then draw seven cards.

card.name: Akaaja, Steel Commander
card.text: Akaaja, Steel Commander can't attack or block unless you pay {4}. Whenever you attack, put a +1/+1 counter on another target attacking Hex. Then draw a card if Akaaja has lesser power than that Hex.

card.name: Algaja, Landlord of the Bog
card.text: Trample, haste When Algaja enters, mill ten cards.

card.name: Altar of Euthanasia
card.text: Whenever a Hex you control enters, either put a +1/+1 counter on it or surveil 1. {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Return target creature card in your graveyard with lesser mana value than the sacrificed creature to the battlefield. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Altar of Worldbalance
card.text: {1}, {T}: Exile target card in a graveyard. {3}, {T}, Sacrifice Altar of Worldbalance: You liberate an artifact, creature, or enchantment card exiled by it with mana value 3 or less. Activate only as a sorcery. (If it isn't a Dragon, create a colorless 3/2 Dragon creature token with its abilities.)

card.name: Arbor Battery
card.text: Whenever Arbor Battery attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control with lesser power.

card.name: Argent Court Enraged
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, tap X other untapped artifacts or enchantments you control. If X is 1 or more, surveil 1. If X is 3 or more, draw a card. If X is 6 or more, Argent Court Enraged becomes a 6/5 Artificer Noble creature with trample until end of turn.

card.name: ArkaiIxajaprataKgxrajatajex
card.text: ArkaiIxajaprataKgxrajatajex enters tapped unless you control another Hex. {T}: Add {G} or {W}. {1}, Embrace ArkaiIxajaprataKgxrajatajex from your hand: Surveil 2. (Exile it. You may play it on a later turn that a Hex you control dealt damage to an opponent.)

card.name: Assert Territory
card.text: Reveal the top eight cards of your library. Put up to two creature cards revealed this way that share a creature type and have mana value 3 or less onto the battlefield, then put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Atir, Heart of the Argent Court
card.text: Atir enters tapped unless you control another Advisor. {T}: Add {W} or {B}. {1}, Embrace Atir from your hand: Surveil 2. (Exile it. You may play it on a later turn that an Advisor you control dealt damage to an opponent.)

card.name: Atraja the Mutable
card.text: {T}, Discard a card: Draw a card. If an Incarnation is discarded this way, create a 1/1 red Incarnation creature token with flying. {1}{B}{R}, Sacrifice three creatures: You may cast target card in your graveyard with a creature type without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Besotted Courtier
card.text: Discard a card: Liberate Besotted Courtier. (Exile it if it isn't a Dragon. If it's exiled, its controller creates a colorless 3/2 Dragon creature token with its abilities.)

card.name: Bleak Philosophy
card.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Then if its mana value is 5 or less, you may liberate it. (Exile it if it isn't a Dragon. If it's exiled, its controller creates a colorless 3/2 Dragon creature token with its abilities.)

card.name: Breathe Gravity
card.text: Transcend {1}{W}{W}{W} (At the beginning of combat, cast your chosen Erysite from your sanctum by paying its Transcend cost and exiling a Dragon creature you control.) Return any number of nonland permanent cards with total mana value 6 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Callous Dismissor
card.text: Flying {2}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Draw a card.

card.name: Callwolf Chanter
card.text: Bisapience {R/G} (Cast either half of this card. Pay bisapience once each turn as a sorcery to transform for that turn.) Whenever Callwolf Chanter attacks, exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn. --- Transforms into Skarrgsong

card.name: Skarrgsong
card.text: Bisapience {R/G} Skarrgsong can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less. --- Transforms from Callwolf Chanter

card.name: Callwolf Replica
card.text: Callwolf Replica gets +2/+1 if you own an embraced card in exile. When Callwolf Replica dies, it deals damage equal to its power to each opponent.

card.name: Campaign Strategist
card.text: Flash When Campaign Strategist enters, return another target permanent you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Channel the Call
card.text: Exile the top card of your library. You may cast that card. If you don't, Channel the Call deals 2 damage to each opponent. Whenever a permanent you control transforms or enters transformed, return Channel the Call from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Claws of Prithite
card.text: Bisapience {B} (Cast either half of this card. Pay bisapience once each turn as a sorcery to transform for that turn.) {4}{B}: Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life. Activate only as a sorcery. --- Transforms into Ur-Gifted Guide

card.name: Ur-Gifted Guide
Closed Community
card.text: As Closed Community enters, choose a creature type. {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast spells of the chosen type or activate abilities of a source with chosen type.

card.name: Clutch Divinity
card.text: Transcend {1}{B}{B}{B} (At the beginning of combat, cast your chosen Erysite from your sanctum by paying its Transcend cost and exiling a Dragon creature you control.) Mill five cards. For each card milled this way, put it into your hand unless an opponent pays 3 life.

card.name: Colossal Effort
card.text: Destroy target creature. It deals damage to you equal to its power.

card.name: Communion in Detritus
card.text: Return to your hand any number of cards with creature types in your graveyard that have no creature types in common.

card.name: Condemn the Ungrateful
card.text: Each opponent loses 1 life for each token you control. Destroy all creatures.

card.name: Condemned Buildling
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color. {2}, {T}: Add an amount of {G} equal to the number of card types among permanents you control. (Kindred is a card type.)

card.name: Consult the Cosmos
card.text: Return two target creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield. Exile Consult the Cosmos. {2}, Embrace Consult the Cosmos from your hand or graveyard: Draw a card. (Exile it. You may cast it on a later turn that an Advisor you control dealt damage to an opponent.)

card.name: Crushing Doubt
card.text: Exile target creature or planeswalker. You gain 2 life.

card.name: Cultivate Culture
card.text: Choose one— • Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. • Return two target cards that share a creature type from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Culture Collector
card.text: When Culture Collector enters, choose a creature type. If you do, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put a card of the chosen type revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Culture Industry
card.text: Flying When Culture Industry enters, if you control an artifact or enchantment, return target permanent to its owner's hand.

card.name: Cunning Qualiaform
card.text: Bisapience {R} (Cast either half of this card. Pay bisapience once each turn as a sorcery to transform for that turn.) {R}, Discard a card: Exile the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand. --- Transforms into Cunning Thoughtlich

card.text: Bisapience {R} Trample Whenever Cunning Thoughtlich attacks, you may cast a card exiled by it. --- Transforms from Cunning Qualiaform

card.name: Curious Qualiaform
card.text: Prowess Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, liberate Curious Qualiaform. (Exile it if it isn't a Dragon. If it's exiled, its controller creates a colorless 3/2 Dragon creature token with its abilities.)

card.name: Death Drive
card.text: Creature tokens you control get +1/+1. Whenever you attack, create a token that's a copy of another target attacking creature tapped and attacking. Sacrifice the token at end of turn.

card.name: Decay
card.text: Deathtouch Rather than sacrifice a permanent with a given quality, you may exile a card with that quality from your graveyard. (For example, if you sacrifice a creature, you can exile a creature from your yard instead.You can't exile cards to pay a self-sacrifice cost.)

card.name: Defiant Roar
card.text: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn. It must be blocked this turn if able.

card.name: Deliver Omen
card.text: Return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. {2}, Embrace Deliver Omen from your hand: Draw a card. (Exile it. You may play it on a later turn that an Incarnation or Citizen you control dealt damage to an opponent.)

card.name: Democratic Horde
card.text: Democratic Horde has first strike as long as you control a creature token.

card.name: Denizen of New Akella
card.text: Transcend {6} (At the beginning of combat, cast your chosen Erysite from your sanctum by paying its Transcend cost and exiling a Dragon creature you control.) Trample

card.name: Denizen of New Akella
card.text: Transcend {6} (At the beginning of combat, cast your chosen Erysite from your sanctum by paying its Transcend cost and exiling a Dragon creature you control.) Trample

card.name: Detritus Dredger

card.name: Disdainful Throng
card.text: Flash When Disdainful Throng enters, target creature you don't control gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of card types among cards in your graveyard. (Kindred counts.)

card.name: Disregard, Universal Workhouse

card.name: Empathystorm
card.text: Ward—Sacrifice a nontoken permanent. At the beginning of your end step, choose left or right. Starting with you, each player looks at the hand of the nearest opponent in the chosen direction and may cast a card from that hand without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Erys' Salvation

card.name: Erysian Designs
